item.description: Our book for August and September is “Mindfulness in Plain English: Revised and Expanded Edition,” by Bhante Henepola Gunaratana, published in 2002 by Wisdom Publications (you can read the original edition instead), available in paperback. With clarity and wit, “Bhante G” takes us step by step through the myths, realities and benefits of meditation and the practice of mindfulness.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a sign on the table that says "book discussion."
item.name: A discussion of "Mindfulness in Plain English" by Gunaratana
